mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT count(cu.coupon_code) as usedcoupon_count, c.coupon_code, c.issue_date, c.expire_date, c.coupon_value FROM coupon c, coupon_use cu WHERE c.expire_date <= sysdate AND c.coupon_code = cu.coupon_code GROUP BY c.coupon_code, c.issue_date, c.expire_date, c.coupon_value )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.expire_date DESC) AS rnum, count(cu.coupon_code) as usedcoupon_count, c.coupon_code, c.issue_date, c.expire_date, c.coupon_value FROM coupon c, coupon_use cu WHERE c.expire_date <= sysdate AND c.coupon_code = cu.coupon_code GROUP BY c.coupon_code, c.issue_date, c.expire_date, c.coupon_value ) t WHERE t.rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
